meanings.definition: Aligns or positions towards a specified direction.
meanings.sent1: The compass orients itself to the north.
meanings.sent2: She orients the map to face the right way.
meanings.sent3: The confused hiker orients the map upside down.
meanings.sent4: His moral compass always orients him towards doing the right thing.
meanings.sent5: The sunflower orients its petals towards the sun for maximum light.

meanings.definition: Helps someone become familiar with a new situation or environment.
meanings.sent1: The tour guide orients the group to the layout of the museum.
meanings.sent2: She orients new employees to the company's policies.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy orients itself to the new toy in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude orients her towards making friends easily.
meanings.sent5: The mentor orients the mentee to the expectations of the program.
